long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With the Kaspr Chrome Extension you can access an accurate B2B database of over 500 million phone numbers and emails through LinkedIn and Sales Navigator. Kaspr fits seamlessly into your current workflow, integrating with CRM tools like Salesforce, HubSpot, and many more‚Ä¶

‚öôÔ∏èHow Does Our Chrome Extension Work?

Kaspr is your plug-and-play tool designed to turbocharge your LinkedIn prospecting and qualify leads in no time. Getting started is simple, and the best part? You can connect with the right buyers directly on LinkedIn or Sales Navigator - free to start!

Here‚Äôs how it works:
- Install the Chrome Extension and connect it with your LinkedIn account.
- Browse LinkedIn or Sales Navigator to find your target accounts and dream leads.
- Open the Kaspr Chrome Extension while on the LinkedIn profiles or search list, enrich your prospects' accurate contact data, and jumpstart your outreach!

üîëFeatures

‚Ä¢ Chrome Extension: Instantly reveal accurate B2B phone numbers and emails from LinkedIn profiles, groups, and events.
‚Ä¢ Data enrichment: Use our Sales Automation Workflows and Bulk Enrichment features to access a vast European-centric database in mass.
‚Ä¢ Integrations: Streamline exporting leads to your CRM or call them directly from the Kaspr dashboard via Aircall and Ringover.
‚Ä¢ API: Enrich your systems using Kaspr‚Äôs API, keep your database up-to-date, and bulk enrich incomplete or stale contact details.

üîíYour privacy

We collect basic information about you, similar to what you‚Äôd hand out on a business card. For more details, please review our Privacy Policy: https://www.kaspr.io/privacy-policy.
